page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: {Play School}Children begin Play School at age 3. There are two Play groups in our area. Children attend each morning. They are encouraged to play happily,and they make things and new friends.{Primary school.}A child begins Primary School after its 4th birthday. The child learns to read, write and draw. The subjects she learns are Maths,English,R.I,Topic and Science,Projects,History,Art and Craft,P.E,etc.{Comprehensive School The child begin the Comprehensive School when it is 11 years old.It continues on from the Primary School. Pupils then leave school for work or further education.{College or {University:}College is where you choose a subject that would help you to find a job you like and study it in depth; like Art, English, etc.
